poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: The real one raves in dotage Reigns supreme with drones that raze In night-shift raids, on time-and-a-half, Your simples to their allotted ground. Such are the reins of power: a title, A raise for dirty work well done. Machine that runs on rails until it doesn't And the rains rust it And the rays of the firmament Touch it.
